ygData.subject: Re: General Questions
ygData.msgSnippet: To answer your last question, the AA ability Mass Group Buff allows you to cast a group buff on everyone within a certain range. A lvl 32 wizzy can probably do
ygData.messageBody:
To answer your last question, the AA ability Mass Group Buff allows
you to cast a group buff on everyone within a certain range.

A lvl 32 wizzy can probably do well in Frontier Montains, Overthere
and Great Divide as alternatives for HK. Find out what faction your
guild is on, Claws of Veeshan or Kael Drakkal. If they're on CoV,
you can raise your faction with the giants in Great Divide. If
they're on Kael faction, then kill the Coldain in GD.

I'm not sure on the other two questions though.

Sucrecian Azuretank, 46th Warrior
Tahksan Rayleaf, 52nd Druid
Proud Members of Keepers of Life
Veeshan Server
